taxYear.description: The tax year of the Document (Billing period from â€“ billing period to), in the format YYYY-YY.

documentId.description: DocumentID may contain SAP document number or Form Bundle Number for zero-amount documents. Must conform to the regular expression ^[0-9a-zA-Z]{1,30}$

formBundleNumber.description: The form bundle number designates a package of related transactions gathered together.

creditReason.description: Credit Reason gives the reason as to why there is a credit on the account. For Examples Voluntary Payment, Income tax Self Assessment Return, Excess Payment
